game.name: In Trusted Hands
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A narrative workshop simulator where you explore clients’ phones, uncover their secrets, choose who to help, and shape both their lives and your own.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A narrative workshop simulator where you explore clients’ phones, uncover their secrets, choose who to help, and shape both their lives and your own.
